name: Brian Bagwell
text: This rental is the best overall vacation home on Weiss Lake! 5 stars! We try to get this one every year that we go to Weiss Lake - It has a spacious, comfortable house with excellent views and a easy to find location.  You can fish from the swim dock or just go swimming. Great place to water ski from dock to the Coosa River flow in Weiss Lake.  Best Deal on the lake! Don't miss it!

name: Tonetta Gilbert
text: My family loves staying here (this past March was our fourth year staying at the house) We always have a great time. While my husband and kids fish, I relax out on the deck with a good book or knitting project. I recommend this house whether you are going to the lake to fish or just to get away from it all.

name: Rick Hauber
text: You can't get much better than this place!  We've stayed here for many years.  It's a beautiful setting with a beautiful view of the lake and the accommodations are awesome.  This house is fully furnished with all linens, bedding and a full laundry room for your convenience.   The kitchen has everything you need, the sleeping accommodations are very comfortable.  After a full day of fishing you can relax in the living room, light the fireplace for those cool evenings or sit around the table and talk.  The multilevel deck is big enough to relax and enjoy the view, sunbathe and there's room to tie up three boats.  There's also a fish cleaning station, with water, on the deck.  The deck is lighted for night fishing or relaxing.

name: Christopher Smith
text: This Was Our Third Trip And As Always A Great Experience. The Place Is Beautiful In The Spring. Prime Location For Fishing. The Dock Is Easily Accessible From The House and Located Just Off The Channel. I Can't Imagine A Better Location For Fishing. The House Is Nice Clean And Fully Furnished. They Have Everything You Need. Just Bring Food And Clothes. This Is Definitely A Trip I Plan On Making For Years To Come.

name: Jerry Pack
text:
A beautiful lake front home including docking facilities and a large outdoor deck. Plenty of parking and easy to access. Furnishings and appliances all updated. No need to take anything but yourself and enjoy.
My family has vacationed in this home for the last 11 years. We rent during the crappie season, which has always been productive. Docking facilities can accommodate up to 3 boats. Fish cleaning table and 110 volt AC available at the dock.
If you enjoy sight seeing, plenty of parks are nearby. If you enjoy shopping, there is and outlet mall not to far from the cabin in Boaz. Summer fun is at an optimum. Boating, skiing or tubing whatever your delight.
The Swifts  are delightful people always taking care of their customers.
So if you are looking for a fishing camp , summer retreat, or   Holiday gathering facility this home will definitely serve your purpose.
Thank you Michael and Lynn for sharing your awesome lake front home with us over the years.
Jerry Pack
Ohio

name: Mark Strange
text: We have been fishing Weiss Lake for 20 plus years, that says a lot about that lake. We have been staying at Michael's house for several of those years. I don't believe that you will find a nicer, more relaxing place to spend time whether you want to fish or just relax in the Alabama sun. The owners of the house will really make your stay enjoyable. So from the crew from southern Indiana come on down and have a great time on a great lake.

name: Jeffery Bates
text: Great place to stay

name: Alfred Flanagan II
text: Love this place

name: Burnette Plumbing
text: I love this place it's very peaceful and me and my wife had a great vacation away from business.

resp.text: Thank you for your positive comments!! We strive to make our cabins a peaceful getaway. We appreciate your business!

name: Michael Nation
text: This is an excellent place. For the price and everything is probably the best anywhere around.

name: Devon Owens
text: This place is really nice. I was very impressed! Cute and exactly what we were looking for!

name: Lee Hunter (Leeboyfla)
text: Great little place to stay had a blast. I'd suggest you bring extra pillows and dont expect a comfy bed. Other then that its flawless.

resp.text: I know it’s been a while since you’ve visited, but Backwater Cabins is under new ownership!! We’ve replaced all mattresses and pillows to make for a more enjoyable stay. We would love to have you back to check out our improvements!

name: Heather Trowell
text: Love this place! Always clean and super friendly owners. Great place for the kids to play too.

name: Travis Eddy
text: Good place to stay while close to the water for fishing and not far for hiking

name: Kevin Barnette
text: The only experience I have had I was a little disappointed on how the, owned reacted but,other than that i was pleased

name: Dawn Ferrell
text: So cute, and homey.

name: Jesus Mendoza
text: Cabin is very clean, lake is just a few steps away. I will recommend this place to anyone great experience

name: Nicole Rickard
text: This is the nicest place we've stayed!! Didnt want to leave. Very kid friendly or great adult getaway! Will definitely be back to spend our money here!

name: David Wyrick
text: My wife and I love these cabins. Reasonably priced, very friendly staff. We both agreed that we could stay here year around.

name: Sheryl Mccaig
text: Love it...

name: Will C
text: Great location and place. The cabins are always kept in good shape. Its I great place to spend the night. Every two cabins share a pier so you can dock a boat right below you cabin. The cabins are always clean. The camp ground and Elliott Branch altogether is clean. If you want to spend the night in little bear creek I would recommend this place. Five Stars

name: Sarah Heskett
text: SUNRISE OVER THE WATER HERE IS WONDERFUL EVIDENCE OF GOD'S PERFECTION...YOU GET THE FEELING OF ACTUALLY WITNESSING HIS MIGHTY HAND CREATING IT...& SO VERY PEACEFUL, SEEMS AS IF WE'RE TOTALLY ALONE!!! SERENE, QUIET, BEAUTIFUL ANNIVERSARY GETAWAY... SURPRISED THAT LITERALLY EVERY NEED WAS PROVIDED FOR, EMERGENCY #'S WE DIDN'T HAVE TO SEARCH FOR & WERE ENCOURAGED TO USE IF NEEDED, A GREAT & FRIENDLY STAFF, BEAUTIFUL PROPERTY...LOVE IT!!!

name: Jada Wideman
text: Cabins we're very clean and the scenery was beautiful!

name: Bryan Ray
text: Nice quite place to stay. Staff is friendly. Cabins have always been clean.

name: Lisa Hines
text: We loved this place ❤️💙💙💙

name: Tyler Morris
text: Home away from home

name: Robert Terrell
text: The cabins are very nice and have a great view of the lake. A great place to spend a weekend with family and friends without breaking the bank.

name: Rita Polley
text: Very well kept,  clean beach beautiful scenery  cabins are walking distance from beach was neatly spaced playground looks clean

name: josh pate
text: Great place to relax and enjoy

name: Terri Mckee Davidson
text: Stayed alnight for our sons birthday  " 14" very nice had everything we needed , clean, wonderful place to stay. Put water back in the lake and it would be perfect.

name: Tim Holcomb
text: Great place to boat.

name: Skinny Gardner
text: Very peaceful & beautiful. Great cabins.

name: Kim Johnson
text: Great place

name: Harding Smith
text: Nice place only thing bad is Wi-Fi

name: Rebecca Arnold
text: Enjoy view, clean cabins,.

name: Olen Hill
text: A lot of fun

name: William Estes
text: Fun family environment

name: Elvin HAtton
text: The overall rating is a 4 1/2 but the mattresses on the beds are like sleeping on a sack full of doorknobs

name: Coachmdt1010 Tice
text: Bass fishing is Terrible..The Worst Ever..

name: Angeletia Jones
text: Best place ever !!!

name: Hazel Critzman
text: Love it

name: Loutina Scott
text: Loved it!!!

name: Curtis Daniel
text: Very nice

name: Lynn Gartman
text: Awesome place to stay, beautiful area, clean nice place. Very charming. Has a cute little loft. Super nice people.

name: Mark Karczewski
text: Nice place and nice people. Perfect midlake location. Will definitely rent again.

name: Eric Campbell
text: Great cabin rental. Very helpful and kind owner. Would recommend this place to anyone looking for a nice place to stay and lake access.

name: Kanitha Randy
text: Awesome place and owners....couldnt ask for a better weekend...I plan on going back as soon as possible...if you are looking for somewhere to get away from the world for a weekend...THIS IS THE PLACE!!!!

name: Kimberly Wilbourn
text: Loved it!
